snippet: The Arkansas Supreme Court tossed out a judge’s ruling striking down the state’s voter ID law on Wednesday, but it stopped short of ruling on the constitutionality of the measure.
abstract: Arkansas Supreme Court tosses out ruling by Circuit Court Judge Tim Fox striking down the state’s voter ID law, but it stops short of ruling on the constitutionality of the measure.
lead_paragraph: The Arkansas Supreme Court tossed out a judge’s ruling striking down the state’s voter ID law on Wednesday, but it stopped short of ruling on the constitutionality of the measure.

headline.main: Arkansas: Ruling on Voter ID Law Tossed Out
headline.print_headline: Arkansas: Ruling on Voter ID Law Tossed Out
